name: Alain Ducasse
description: Alain Ducasse is a French-born Monégasque chef. He operates a number of restaurants including Alain Ducasse at The Dorchester which holds three stars in the Michelin Guide.

recipes.name: Ratatouille
recipes.cookingMethod: To make ratatouille, chop onions, bell peppers, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes into small pieces and cook them with garlic and olive oil in a large saucepan. Add thyme and season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook the vegetables until they are tender and the sauce has thickened. Serve hot or cold with crusty bread.

recipes.name: Seared Scallops
ingradient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

name: Joël Robuchon
description: Joël Robuchon was a French chef and restaurateur. He was named 'Chef of the Century' by the guide Gault Millau in 1989, and awarded the Meilleur Ouvrier de France in cuisine in 1976.

recipes.name: Chocolate Tart
recipes.cookingMethod: To make Grilled Lamb Chops, chop onions, bell peppers, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes into small pieces and cook them with garlic and olive oil in a large saucepan. Add thyme and season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook the vegetables until they are tender and the sauce has thickened. Serve hot or cold with crusty bread.

recipes.name: Coq Au Vin
recipes.cookingMethod: To make Coq Au Vin, you would first clean and prepare the fish and shellfish, removing the heads, bones, and shells. In a large pot or Dutch oven, you would sauté chopped onion, leek, and fennel in olive oil until softened, then add garlic, tomato, thyme, bay leaf, and orange peel and cook for another few minutes. Next, you would add fish stock and white wine to the pot and bring to a simmer. Finally, you would add the fish and shellfish to the pot and cook until done. The soup is traditionally served with rouille, a garlicky mayonnaise-like condiment.

name: Anne-Sophie Pic
description: Anne-Sophie Pic is a French chef best known for regaining three Michelin stars for her restaurant, Maison Pic, in southeast France. She is the fourth female chef to win three Michelin stars, and was named the Best Female Chef by The World's 50 Best Restaurants in 2011.

name: Éric Ripert
description: Eric Frank Ripert is a French chef, author, and television personality specializing in modern French cuisine and noted for his work with seafood.

name: Guy Savoy
description: Guy Savoy is a French chef who is the head chef and owner of the eponymous Guy Savoy restaurant in Paris and its sister restaurant in Las Vegas, both of which have gained multiple Michelin stars. He owns three other restaurants in Paris.
